questions.question: What is Gotham: Arkham Rises?
questions.answer:
Gotham: Arkham Rises is a ground-breaking original immersive live ‘theatrical’ experience, based on one of DC’s most iconic characters: Batman. It is based on an original story created and written by Myriad Entertainment and produced by Dept Studios Inc.

Batman is missing. Arkham Asylum has been razed to the ground. On the former site, the luxury development: “Arkham Rises”, reaches up to the sky, casting a new shadow over the city.

Our audience members play the citizens of Gotham City, invited to attend a demonstration of the pioneering rehabilitation methods, but what feast of fools lies within? Anything can happen.

Set in a vast, multi-sensory world, Gotham: Arkham Rises is an epic, two-hour, free-roaming experience: combining interactive theatre, stunning design and futuristic tech to immerse you in a new and original story like never before.

Witness the story unfold or choose your own adventure, alongside 30 iconic characters including Scarecrow, Catwoman, Poison Ivy and many more.

Lose yourself in Gotham: Arkham Rises - a full evening's entertainment, including in-world bars, a post-show venue and exclusive Batman merchandise.

This uniquely suspenseful piece of theatre allows the audience to enter Arkham and fight for the future of Gotham City.

This is an 18+ production.
